Classes

class  FdoIDestroySpatialContext
 The FdoIDestroySpatialContext interface defines the DestroySpatialContext command, which destroys an existing spatial context. Input to the command is the name of the context to destroy. Destroying a spatial context destroys all data stored in that context. More...
